titles.title: A resolution recognizing the month of October 2018 as "National Principals Month".
A resolution recognizing the month of October 2018 as "National Principals Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Recognizes October 2018 as National Principals Month and supports its goals and ideals.
Honors the contributions of principals in elementary, middle, and high schools in the United States.
